name: AttachOpeningHoursTemplateToOrganizationUnitSets
description:
Attaches an OpeningHoursTemplate to the given OrganizationUnitSets.
When `OverrideIfOpeningHoursTypeAlreadyAttached` is set to true, the service detaches the template of the same type before attaching the new template.
When `OverrideIfOpeningHoursTypeAlreadyAttached` is set to false, the service will fail if one of the given OrganizationUnitSets is already attached to a OpeningHoursTemplate of the same Type.
